game.title: Example Quest
game.#text:
objective>Collect 100 flowers
	description>Find flowers scattered around the woods
	 reward>Get rewarded with a beautiful bouquet
	quest-giver:Bert the Explorer's Guild

	 quests:
	| Order | Objective | Description |
	--- | --- | --- |
	1 | Gather 10 flowers of one type | Gather 10 flower scattered around the woods |
	2 | Gather 20 flowers of one type and 5 flowers of another type | Gather 20 flowers of one type and 5 flowers of another type |
